categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Dominator was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer in service in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War.

The Dominator was under the command of Captain Worhven during the Galactic Civil War. Some time after the Battle of Yavin, the ship was used to test the first steps of the NOVA project. Its probe droids were equipped with a new cloaking device developed by Santhe/Sienar Technologies on Lianna. The technology was so effective that the Dominator completely lost control of its probe droids.
